Package edu.cscc.javaadventure.engine.combat

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Combatant
    This interface is used in combat situations in order to hide the underlying implementations of the combatants.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttackDescription  
    CharacterCombatant
    Represents a Combatant which is backed by a Character in the JavaAdventure game.
    CombatValidator  
    Goblin
    Represent a goblinoid creature in the JavaAdventure game.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OpponentIncapacitatedException
    Exception thrown during combat when a Combatant has already been incapacitated and can no longer fight.
    UnableToWieldWeaponException
    Exception thrown when a fails to equip a two-handed weapon.
